title: Workshop on Thesis Design for Teacher-Training Linked Educational Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Holders of bachelor’s/master’s degrees, with teaching experience or practical experience in education
context.additional_context: A program supporting academic transition processes through participatory inquiry dialogues, enabling current teachers and educational practitioners to systematically design degree theses linked to their profession. It focuses on empowering learners from diverse academic backgrounds to identify research topics connected to educational settings and strengthen thesis-writing competencies.

learning_goals: Design one thesis topic connecting their academic background with teaching practice through participatory inquiry dialogue.
Select research methodologies for solving educational field problems and concretize implementation plans.
Complete over 80% of a thesis draft by incorporating feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
